repo_list.description: Emacs Prelude is an enhanced Emacs configuration that should make your experience with Emacs both more pleasant and more powerful.
Erlang MySQL driver + light SSL support (connects to Amazon RDS)
redis erlang client library (imported from bitbucket)
Screwing around, a trivial gen_server that takes DNA that you provide (as a binary) and translates it into a protein sequence.
geohash/proximity lookup in pure, uncut erlang.
Erlang library for sending metrics to New Relic
An Emacs mode for editing Pony code.
Persistent, distributed (more replicated ,really) counters with support for incr/decr, floats
Exploring writing a redis client in Erlang
Super simple way to get your bucket's data as CSV (I use it to build data frames in R easier)
A NIF around xmlsec to handle XML signatures in Erlang
